page.title: 18Tetbury Hill Development
page.content: There are 3 major developments in the {Tetbury Hill}area.A new{Gateway {supermarket}is opening on 6th August 1985 opposite Station Yard.It will be the biggest supermarket in Malmesbury and has 70 parking spaces.{252 houses are being built at{Reed's Farm}by {Persimmon Homes.}16 children at this school live there of whom only 2 lived here before.The{Youth Centre}used to be part of the old primary school and was opened in April 1985.7 people work there part-time.It has a wide range of equipment and is used by groups of all ages,including the Youth and Judo clubs.In{Youth Club}on Friday night we play lots of games like snooker,darts, table tennis and draughts.Sometimes we have a disco and the best dancer wins a prize.14 people usually go to{Judo {Club}on Wednesday night.We practise judo for 2 hours.
